title: Groundbreaking Solutions
content: So this isn't exactly my design for a Verizon call center in the Andes, but no one said it's "either/or".  [Global university students](http://worldgame.blogspot.com/2007/06/our-global-u-advertisement.html) circulate among centers, checking out the solutions.  Diversity rocks.
author: Kirby Urner
